')); // Close menu when click in tab $(document).on('click', '.connections .panellist li', function(){ $('.connections').mmenu().trigger("close.mm"); }); $(".left-menu-btn").click(function () { $('.connections').mmenu().trigger( "open.mm" ); if(typeof ga !== 'undefined' && !usedMenu) { ga('send', 'event', 'left_menu', 'used'); } usedMenu = true; }); $( ".connections" ).promise().done(function() { $('.connections').mmenu({ counters : true }); }); }); });
